sentences.english: The first use of cemented fragmental rock filling in China was conducted atTongkeng tin mine operated by Dachang Mine Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 大厂铜坑锡矿在国内率先使用块石砂浆胶结充填法。

sentences.english: The utility model fills the blank of the special tank car for transporting the bulk dry-mixed mortar in China.
sentences.chinese: 填补了国内干混砂浆无散装运输专用罐车的空白。

sentences.english: Study on optimazing measure of neat cement slurry and cement paste for oil well;
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究了磁化水对水泥砂浆和净浆性能的影响。

sentences.english: Modified effect was studied on fresh mortar and hardens mortar with bentonite.
sentences.chinese: 研究了膨润土对新拌砂浆和硬化砂浆的改性效果。

sentences.english: Modified effect was studied on fresh mortar and hardens mortar with bentonite.
sentences.chinese: 研究了膨润土对新拌砂浆和硬化砂浆的改性效果。

sentences.english: Check to ensure the mortar pad is thick enough and if not, add more pads till it is enough.
sentences.chinese: 检查砂浆垫块厚度是否准确，并根据需要垫够。

sentences.english: When you shake brick, the mortar in between dissolves.
sentences.chinese: 当震动砖块的时候，夹在其中的砂浆就溶解了。

sentences.english: Fly-ash mortar is seldom used in Dalian.
sentences.chinese: 粉煤灰砂浆粉在大连地区鲜有使用。

sentences.english: Mortar used for enhancing the cohesiveness between insulating layers and rendering rending coating.
sentences.chinese: 用于增强保温层与抹面层之间粘结性的砂浆。

sentences.english: The research investigates the workability and strength of paste and mortar, which were mixed with magnetic water.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究了磁化水对水泥砂浆和净浆性能的影响。

sentences.english: Red bricks lining should be done with cement mortar.
sentences.chinese: 红砖砌筑采用水泥砂浆。

sentences.english: Reinforced concrete beams with anticorrosive mortar and high-strength steel is a new strengthen technology.
sentences.chinese: 防腐砂浆高强钢丝加固混凝土梁是一项加固新技术。

sentences.english: The effects of SAE on the strength of cement paste and cement mortar was studied.
sentences.chinese: 通过试验考察了共聚物对水泥及水泥砂浆强度的影响。

sentences.english: The expansion of mortar bas and concrete prisms were tested.
sentences.chinese: 测定了砂浆棒和混凝土棱柱体的膨胀率。

sentences.english: The cement mortar will coat the outside seams of the wall plates.
sentences.chinese: 在墙板缝隙外侧，进行水泥砂浆罩面。

sentences.english: For tile work, a very thin mortar called grout is used.
sentences.chinese: 制瓦使用的是一种叫做薄泥浆的很薄的砂浆。

definition: aggregate (sand or gravel used in concrete 混凝土)
to plaster/to render (a wall)/(fig.) to bring shame on/also pr. [mo4 hui1]
to point a brick wall/to grout a tiled surface
